question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:

A. cup
B. pole on the right
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The pole on the right is clearly positioned in the background, beyond the man and the cow, while the cup is held close to the manâ€™s chest, making it much closer to the camera.
